column2: Well, again, with all due respect, you know, I  after the last debate, for example, I went to a place in Florida called Homestead, and there is a private detention facility being paid for by your taxpayer dollars, a private detention facility that currently houses 2,700 children.
column4: Says children at Homestead migrant facility "get 30 minutes over a month to talk to family members. If they were in a prison  a federal prison  they would get 300 minutes."
